content:
本件保存七年
02-62- 1909 MENO
June 19, 2
To
: Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, U.S. AID/C
From
: C. C. Chang, Chief, Second DivisionOriginal signed by
C. C. Chang
Subject
: Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX (99-471)
Reference is made to the attached Reports of Excess Equipment and copies of SDC letter SDC-5281 dated June 13, 1962 and MKA letter MK-1533 dated June 11, 1962.
In the above letter, SDG requested that wire rope be procured. If you concur and it is available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and ahirment to Taiwan.
Encl. Heports Copies of GDC/MKA letters cc: SDC JGwhite (with copies of SDC/MKA letters) BES ( 17 # 2D ( ? 3 CSK/sml
E -16.13.2
51. 3. 100× 200
243
國史馆 Academia Historica
D
